description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 12 April 2018 (RN:17/09922/FULL) for: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission dated 11 September 2015 (RN 15/03469/FULL) for "Use of 8 Grosvenor Square and 1a and 2 Duke's Yard as a single family dwelling with rear extensions to 8 Grosvenor Square at second to fourth floor levels; infilling of east lightwell and creation of terrace at third floor level; new plant room at roof level. Demolition of ground and first floor rear extension to 1a and 2 Duke's Yard and replacement with new building on sub-basement, basement and ground floors with extended garden terrace to the main house over. Use of 1 Duke's Yard as a single family dwelling. Associated internal and external alterations to all buildings. NAMELY, to allow alterations to the roof plant ductwork, attenuator and air intake/exhaust; amendment to flue; introduction of hoop iron and lanterns to railings at Brook Street elevation; amended CCTV positions at Brook Street Elevation & Courtyard East Elevations; and internal amendments to the swimming pool, garages and stairs. (S73 application).
